## Adalberto Lonardi is an interdisciplinary creative practice on a mission to empower the community through art and design.

Founded in 2015, we deliver design and communication strategies focused on the social needs of tomorrow. We seek simple, straightforward solutions, bold aesthetics, and meaningful narratives to develop projects that contribute to children’s and adults’ education, social integration, and community empowerment. A balanced combination of creativity, methodology, and care describes the approach to our everyday design.

We believe in sustainable, long-lasting, and social-based design solutions. We believe in reuse, reintegrate, retrain, remarket the available resources. We believe in a simple, inclusive and universal language. We believe in a design approach where community, sustainability, and simplicity are the assets for a prosperous living.
